atomic_library.description: Move the end effector to a specified pose relative to a target or in the world frame.
pre_conditions: A collision-free path to [relative_pose] relative to [target_id] exists

atomic_library.description: Open the gripper to a non-contact state.
pre_conditions: end_effector is not holding any object

atomic_library.description: Close the gripper to grasp an object.
pre_conditions: end_effector is at a valid grasp pose for [obj_id]

atomic_library.description: Open the gripper to relinquish a held object onto/into/relative to a target.
pre_conditions: end_effector is at a valid release pose for [target_id] with [relation]
post_conditions: [obj_id] is supported by or placed relative to [target_id] per [relation]

atomic_library.description: Set a controllable entity (joint, door, drawer, appliance, control) to a desired discrete state (e.g., open/closed, on/off).
